bibl.title: The Byzantine 'Eagle' Countermark - Re-attributed from Egypt to Palestine.
bibl.note: Introduction. - The countermark. - The host coins. - Catalogue [Nos 1-25]. - Provenance. - Dating [probably in the years 637-640]. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Wolfgang Schulze, The Byzantine 'Eagle' Countermark - Re-attributed from Egypt to Palestine.
Israel Numismatic Research 4 (2009) pp. 113-120, 5 tabl., 2 figg. et pl. 19.
